meanings.sent1: The tall buildings and bustling streets give the city an urbaner feel.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the urbaner atmosphere of downtown to the quiet suburbs.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons in the city seem to have an urbaner strut compared to those in the park.
meanings.sent4: His urbaner sense of fashion stood out among his small-town friends.
meanings.sent5: The graffiti artist added an urbaner touch to the blank wall, transforming it into a work of art.

meanings.definition: more sophisticated or refined in manner or style, especially compared to someone from a rural area
meanings.sent1: Her urbaner way of speaking impressed everyone at the fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent2: He always dressed in an urbaner manner, with tailored suits and polished shoes.
meanings.sent3: The goat wearing sunglasses tried to look urbaner, but it just ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: Her urbaner taste in music opened up new genres for her friends to explore.
meanings.sent5: The urbaner gentleman's polite demeanor and elegant gestures charmed everyone he met.
